llm_res.rule: transfer(address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - Callers MUST handle false from returns (bool success). Callers MUST NOT assume that false is never returned!
transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) - Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event.
